headline.main: The Commissariat Experiences of the Crimean War.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: I have read with interest your article on the Commissariat of the Army, in the TIMES of this morning, and I agree with you that the subject is one to which it is hardly possible to attach too great importance. headline.main: LOCAL MILITARY MOVEMENTS.; UNION DEFENCE COMMITTEE.

docs.lead_paragraph: Resolutions complimentary to the Seventh Regiment, were passed by the Union Defence Committee, yesterday, and the members of the Committee will turn out to receive them on their return, today. The Seventy-ninth Regiment the Ninth (Col. HAWKINS), and the Twentieth (Col. WEBBER), will probably leave to-day; the first for Washington, and the last two for Fort Monroe.
